result.eng: I can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.orig: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.html: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom an túr a ḟeiceáil tá cnoc sa ḃealaċ ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
